V.iii.1.E.1.d
.
Fractures Associated With GSW/SFW
All fractures associated with a GSW and/or shell fragment wound (SFW) will be considered open because all of them involve an opening to the outside.Â  Most GSW/SFW fractures are also comminuted due to the shattering nature of the injury.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E - Muscle Injuries
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E
